titles.title: Pray For Me While You're Praying

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Pray for me while you're praying
Pray for me while you're singing
All you sons of God, while in the light you trod,
Pray, Oh pray for me.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Pray for me to always keep the faith;
Pray for me while I run this race.
All you sons of God, while in the light you trod,
Pray, oh pray for me.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Pray for me because I'm homeward bound.
Pray for me to get my righteous crown.
Oh you sons of God, while on this earth you trod,
Pray, oh pray for me.
